examples: Have you heard the latest news?
The government declined to comment on the latest developments.
the latest version of the software
The latest round of talks was productive.
She always wears the latest fashions.
The latest unemployment figures are not good news for the government.

meanings.def: the most recent or the newest thing or piece of news
examples: the latest (in something) This is the latest in robot technology.
She has written several novels; her latest is ‘An American Marriage’.

meanings.def: no later than the time or the date mentioned
examples: Applications should be in by next Monday at the latest.

idioms.def: no later than the time or the date mentioned
examples: Applications should be in by next Monday at the latest.
